law.catch_line: Restrictions on sale or delivery of contact lenses to Kentucky residents by nonresidents.
law.text:
No person located outside of Kentucky shall ship, mail, deliver, or sell contact lenses to a patient at a Kentucky address unless:
Registered with the Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Kentucky; and
In possession of a valid contact lens prescription as defined and described in KRS 367.680 and 367.681.
law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 7, effective June 24, 2003.
